medium: Cotton, silk; weft-face plain weave, embroidery
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: Two panel huipil; four selvage; red field broken by thin blue and white striping; embroidered neckline of maroon and orange and pink; seams joined by black; fuscia, yellow, purple and pink squares below neck opening.
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
